== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
var:
  description: a variable
  default:
    jinja: '{{ information }}'
    params:
      information:
        type: information
        information: test_information
        variable: _.var
    description: returns the information
----
